summary: A countess flees to Monte Carlo on the day of her wedding, where she is courted by a count posing as a hairdresser.
cast: Jack Buchanan|Jeanette MacDonald|Claud Allister|Zasu Pitts|Tyler Brooke|John Roche|Lionel Belmore|Albert Conti|Helen Garden|Donald Novis|Erik Bey|David Percy|Max Barwyn|Billy Bevan|Sidney Bracey|John Carroll|Frances Dee|Geraldine Dvorak|Edgar Norton|Rolfe Sedan
title: Monte Carlo
